1232030.name: Smash Up - Pretty Pretty
1232030.description:
Think only pirates, time travelers, vampires and bears can smash bases? Well, get ready to be taught a lesson… in the nicest way possible!

By purchasing Pretty Pretty Smash Up, you’ll add the following 4 factions to Smash Up:

  • Kitty Cats
  • Princesses
  • Fairies
  • Mythic Horses

What factions will you be smashing together?



From deep in the magical glades come these little sprites, bringing magical wishes and pixie dust to your plans for world domination. Don’t judge them by their size!

The Fairies’ will grant your wishes, especially if those wishes involve crushing your opponents!


The power of togetherness shines through in Mythic Horses, whose mighty herds race across the land, trampling any who stand in their way. Not only normal horses, but pegasi, sea-horses and more will join the fight for the base! Remember that friendship is… smashable!


Can haz base? Kitty Cats have the power to compel those of weak will to do what they wish… and the power to have billions of internet memes. Perhaps those are the key? Either way, the Kitty Cats will use their alluring power to dominate the fight at any base. You CAN haz base after all!


Dream a dream of ruling over your enemies! Princesses will make every wish come true through the power of pure love and happiness. Which can be used, oddly, to order everyone about, and even destroy your enemies. Don’t be fooled: these innocent-looking beauties are few in number, but royal, strong and determined!
1232030.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
